overview:
Brook is responsible for sourcing, executing and managing new investments while supporting existing portfolio companies in Deutsche Telekom’s T-Mobile Venture Fund. As an investor focused on mobile internet and digital media platforms, he brings a combination of operational and strategic advisory experience to the portfolio. +22 years of global leadership experience in software and wireless services corporate, business and product development teams enable his contributions to entrepreneurs and investors.

2010 Panel participation: MobileBeat VC Forum, SD Forum Silicon Valley, Strickland Consulting CIO Forum

Specialties: Investments, eco-system development, deal structure, product strategy, strategic planning and international business.
